name: places/ChIJw1vPh4lYwokRw7VE-xcgu3M
formattedAddress: 287 Amsterdam Ave C, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 287 Amsterdam Ave C, New York, NY 10023-2103, USA

originalText.text: Have had a lovely experience with everyone at this business.  It's an old-school and I think family-owned store, so no bells and whistles, but staff are helpful and kind, prices are super reasonable ($8 boot shine, $15 shoe stretch), work is good (I've heard them give caveats to customers to clarify what they can and can't promise, e.g. difficult stain removals, and they re-stretched a shoe of mine for free when it was still too small).  Love this spot.

text.text: Have had a lovely experience with everyone at this business.  It's an old-school and I think family-owned store, so no bells and whistles, but staff are helpful and kind, prices are super reasonable ($8 boot shine, $15 shoe stretch), work is good (I've heard them give caveats to customers to clarify what they can and can't promise, e.g. difficult stain removals, and they re-stretched a shoe of mine for free when it was still too small).  Love this spot.

originalText.text: One of the reviews said that if there was a problem, "they would make it good". I went in there for a scuffed shoe, paid $35 in advance for them to fix it and give the shoes a shine. When I picked up the shoes, the scuff was still plainly visible. He threw some more polish on them, so I paid #35 for a shoe shine. Go elsewhere.
